rows.label: qev085401_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey there, Mathias.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0002
rows.name: Gwin, sir! You're with Colonel Elma's squad today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0003
rows.name: I don't think we've met. My name's Lin Lee Koo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0004
rows.name: Tatsu is Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0005
rows.name: My name's Mathias. I'm a Mediator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0006
rows.name: May I ask what you're all doing together, sir?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0007
rows.name: I needed help on a mission, so I called in a favor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0008
rows.name:
Geez, Gwin! Being on Irina's team is already impressive,
but this is... Wow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0009
rows.name: Actually, Irina and I both rely on Gwin a great deal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0010
rows.name: Wh-what? Really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0011
rows.name: Man... I wish I could join an elite BLADE team...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0012
rows.name: Maybe if I wasn't screwing up on the job all the time...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0013
rows.name: Whoa, what's with all the doom and gloom, Mathias?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0014
rows.name: You're usually so...annoyingly upbeat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0015
rows.name: Hey now, Gwin, c'mon—be nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0016
rows.name: What's wrong, Mathias? Maybe we can help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0017
rows.name:
Oh, I couldn't have elites like you
wasting time on little old me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0018
rows.name: I'll work it out myself. It's nothing. Really.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0019
rows.name: Mathias not very good at whole lying thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0020
rows.name: What? I'm not—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0021
rows.name: Tatsu smell your desperation...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0022
rows.name:
It is desperation of friend who cannot decide
what to eat for breakfast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0023
rows.name: Er, yeah. It's actually more of a work thing, so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_JNK0010
rows.name: Leave

rows.label: qev085401_SEL0011
rows.name: Walk away without forcing Mathias to talk about it.

rows.label: qev085401_JNK0020
rows.name: Interrogate

rows.label: qev085401_SEL0021
rows.name: Press Mathias to tell you his problem.

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0024
rows.name: Wait, we're just going to ignore his problem?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0025
rows.name:
He's clearly not eager to talk about it.
Let's leave the poor man be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0026
rows.name: Well, yeah, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0026_2
rows.name: Mathias, are you really okay with this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0028
rows.name: Yeah, come on! It's obvious you want to talk about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0029
rows.name:
Here, why don't you think about it out loud,
and we'll just happen to casually overhear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0030
rows.name: That's...kinda weird...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0031
rows.name:
Mathias, seriously. At the end of the day, 
we're all BLADEs here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0032
rows.name: If there's a problem, then just tell us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0033
rows.name: Sir, I...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0034
rows.name: All right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0035
rows.name:
If you really don't mind...I need your help.
Here, take a look at this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0036
rows.name: Oh my God, how adorable! I love cats![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0037
rows.name:
Love to EAT them, Lin means. Just like
Lin does all adorable creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0038
rows.name: What?! I'd never eat a cat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0039
rows.name: She's my problem, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0040
rows.name: Her name's Aisha, and I need help finding her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0041
rows.name: Oh no! Your cat ran away? That's horrible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0042
rows.name: I feel silly troubling you with something so minor...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0043
rows.name: But she hasn't been home in over a day, and I'm worried sick.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0044
rows.name:
Hold on a sec—I thought you said
your problem was work-related.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0045
rows.name: Is the cat somehow related to your job as a Mediator?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0046
rows.name: Actually, she is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0047
rows.name:
She's part of a study on the adaptability
of Earth species here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0048
rows.name: Huh. That does sound important.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0049
rows.name:
Yeah, well, it's not like I'm shooting indigens
in the face like you guys...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_JNK0030
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: qev085401_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Mathias he should be proud of what he does.

rows.label: qev085401_JNK0040
rows.name: Lecture

rows.label: qev085401_SEL0041
rows.name: Insist that Mathias's work is quite valuable.

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0050
rows.name:
Hey, look—our job might sound more
glamorous and exciting...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0051
rows.name:
Well, okay, it probably IS more glamorous and
exciting—but that doesn't make it more important.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0052
rows.name:
Gwin's right. We're all working for
a better future here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0053
rows.name:
All parts of that struggle carry equal value
as far as we're concerned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0054
rows.name:
That's right! And it's not like just any
old BLADE can do it, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0055
rows.name: Lin's right. I'd be lost trying to attempt your line of work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0056
rows.name:
We each choose the tasks that best let us
express our unique talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0057
rows.name: Thank you, ma'am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0058
rows.name: Right then. Let's get out there and find little Aisha.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0059
rows.name:
NLA's a pretty big place—I'm not
exactly sure where we'd start. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0060
rows.name: Are there certain areas she frequented you can tell us about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0061
rows.name: A few, I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0062
rows.name:
Though I already searched all the nearby parks and such.
Beyond that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0063
rows.name: Hmm, let's see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0064
rows.name:
Do you have anything with her scent on it?
Maybe Tatsu here could sniff her out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0065
rows.name: Meh! Tatsu is not bloodhound![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0066
rows.name: How the heck do you know about bloodhounds?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0067
rows.name: Actually, I just thought of something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0068
rows.name:
A few times she came home covered in oil...
Like, motor oil, or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0069
rows.name: It took forever to scrub it off her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0070
rows.name: Motor oil, huh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0071
rows.name:
That would narrow it down to the industrial district
and the lower administrative district, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0072
rows.name:
All right. We'll check out the
lower administrative district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0073
rows.name:
Mathias, you take the industrial district.
If you find anything, let us know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085401_MSG0074
rows.name:
Understood. Thank you, everyone,
and sorry again for all the trouble.[ST:wait ]
